Intro.Heading: Welcome to Namsor Chinese names application
Intro.Description: You can translate Pinyin to Chinese, identify gender from Pinyin/Chinese, or get the score/probability of a Chinese and Pinyin names to match.

GenderTab.Heading: Chinese Name Gender
GenderTab.Description: Infer gender by first name and last name
GenderTab.Error: Make sure first name and last name are not empty.

TranslationTab.Description: Translate between Pinyin name and Chinese name
TranslationTab.Error: Make sure first name and last name are not empty.
TranslationTab.ResultTitle: 's Chinese name is (All possible names ranked by probabilities from high to low):

MatchingTab.Heading: Match Chinese Name and Pinyin
MatchingTab.Description: Check probability of a Chinese name and pinyin name to match with each other
MatchingTab.Error: Make sure first name, last name, and Chinese name are not empty.

Service.Heading: Start Free with 24/7 support
Service.Description: Our API is free to check up to 450 names per month. We have additional subscription plans to support your organization with higher volumes. With state-of-the-art infrastructure, we provide 99.95% uptime and 24/7 monitoring and maintenance

MachineLearning.Heading: Machine Learning powered Namsor API
MachineLearning.Description: This service is powered by NamSor API, a powerful machine learning API to process Chinese names (detect gender, translate Pinyin to Chinese and calculate score/probability for matching Pinyin and Chinese name). The Origin API can also help distinguish Chinese, Japanese and other foreign names.

PricePlans.Heading: Fair, simple pricing for all
PricePlans.Description: No additional costs. Pay for what you use.

BasicPlan.Name: Basic Plan
BasicPlan.Item1: 1 Chinese name API call uses 1 unit
BasicPlan.Item2: Free up to 5000 units per Month
